titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Frank K. Singiser papers and audio-cassettes

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

did.unittitle: Frank K. Singiser papers and audio-cassettes

archdesc.bioghist: Resident of Mount Kisco, New York.
archdesc.scopecontent: Contents of collection in sealed envelopes, but materials probably relate to Singiser's career and to University of Michigan history.
